sentences.en: Don't get close to me; I'm about to get seasick.
sentences.cn: 不要靠近我, 我要晕船了.

sentences.en: Especially when I feel seasick, I can't stand watching someone else vomiting. "
sentences.cn: 尤其晕船的时候, 看不得人家呕. ”

sentences.en: Especially when I seasick, I can't stand watching someone else vomiting.
sentences.cn: 尤其晕船的时候, 看不得人家呕.

sentences.en: He gets seasick every time he crosses the channel.
sentences.cn: 他每次渡英吉利海峡时都晕船.

sentences.en: He got seasick and heaved up.
He got seasick during the voyage.
I felt seasick so I went up on deck for some fresh air.
sentences.cn: 我有些晕船,所以到甲板上去呼吸些新鲜空气.

sentences.en: It was quite rough at times, and she was seasick.
sentences.cn: 有时海上波涛汹涌，她就会晕船。

sentences.en: Seven sleazy shysters in sharkskin suits sold sheared sealskins to seasick sailors.
sentences.cn: 7个穿着鲨鱼皮外套的差劲的骗子把剪平的海豹皮卖给晕船的水手.

sentences.en: The sea was rough and half the passengers were seasick.
sentences.cn: 海面波涛汹涌,半数旅客晕船.

sentences.en: The sea was so rough that nearly everybody was seasick.
sentences.cn: 海浪很大,几乎每个人都晕船.

sentences.en: The sight of food was hateful to the seasick girl.
sentences.cn: 那个晕船的女孩看到食物就感到厌恶.

sentences.en: The swing of the ship made many people seasick.
sentences.cn: 船的摇摆使许多人晕船.

sentences.en: When I get seasick , I throw up my food.
You loathe the smell of greasy food when you are seasick.
sentences.cn: 当你晕船时,你会厌恶油腻的气味.

trans.tran_en: feeling ill when you travel in a boat, because of the movement of the boat in the water
